Guess 33 chosen final Expedition. I’ve thinking creators chose number 33 final expedition, fits in-world it’s 33rd attempt stop Paintress, might deeper symbolic meaning, possibly drawing Freemasonic esoteric traditions. Here’s case it: # 33? * 33 highest degree Scottish Rite Freemasonry, associated *illumination, hidden knowledge,* *enlightenment initiation*. * It’s also significant religion mysticism e.g., Jesus crucified 33, 33 vertebrae human spine. * numerology, 33 “master number” representing *sacrifice, transformation,* *higher purpose;* themes relevant game. # “Clair Obscur” = Light Dark * game’s subtitle literally means **“**light-dark”, echoing Masonic interest duality: light vs. darkness, ignorance vs. knowledge, illusion vs. truth. * Visually thematically, game leans chiaroscuro high contrast, metaphor uncovering deeper reality. # Symbolic Architecture * Arc de Triomphe split half**,** possibly representing Twin Pillars Boaz Jachin, foundational Masonic symbol representing duality threshold knowledge. * Gommage scene, two giant statues hard ignore pier, evoking Masonic mythic guardian figures flanking initiatory rite. # Expedition = Initiation * term “Expedition” implies journey quest, kill godlike being, uncover truth, exactly Masonic initiatory rites metaphorically about. * it’s 33rd expedition, may symbolize *final degree* understanding enlightenment. # Paintress Demiurge? * Paintress believed control fate, Lumiere believe decides disappears year. fits archetype Demiurge: false god shaping reality keeping people ignorance. * Expedition fight, symbolic rebellion illusion, another strong esoteric theme. # # TL;DR use 33, name *Clair Obscur*, dual statues, broken Arc, underlying quest truth suggest Freemasonic esoteric inspiration. might explicit, symbolic parallels strong. Would love hear anyone else thoughts this.

D:TDA great far, couple things really hope change. Aside Dragon missions knew people didn’t enjoy even game dropped, couple little gameplay things get nerves quite bit. big one put away shield switch weapons. cannot tell many times I’ve middle fight died tried switch situationally optimal weapon completely removed ability block incoming attack 2 seconds. can’t really think way limitation serves gameplay? really fucks combat flow major way leads copious amounts frustration. Second input lag, specifically, cannot cancel actions reactively. go melee Hell Knight, can’t reactively cancel melee attempt block incoming attack. Instead, character follows melee through, gets reduced 5 HP, *then* blocks, know, point entirely moot. also can’t switch weapons one new slo-mo melee glory kills, disappointing gives enough time pick one want follow exit slo-mo without actually giving ability so. Anyway, core combat really good satisfying. Great game. hope becomes common complaint patch things out.
